automodpack.restart.update: An update be downloaded to the modpack, shiver me timbers!
automodpack.restart.select: The modpack required by the server be selected, savvy?
automodpack.restart.automodpack: Updated the AutoModpack mod to the one the server demands!
automodpack.restart.description: To play, ye must restart this here game, matey.
automodpack.restart.secDescription: D'ye wish to restart now, ye scurvy dog?
automodpack.danger: This server provides an external modpack, weigh anchor!
automodpack.danger.secDescription: It might be risky! DO NOT download if ye trust not the server captains!
automodpack.danger.thiDescription: Malicious servers can provide mods with malware, beware!
automodpack.download.noFiles: No files to download, blast it!
automodpack.redownload.description: It may fix issues with the modpack, savvy.
automodpack.error: Something went wrong, by the kraken!
automodpack.error.files: Failed to download some files, blow me down.
automodpack.error.critical: A critical error whilst downloading the modpack!
automodpack.error.logs: Check for more details in the logs, arrr.
automodpack.fetch: Fetchin' direct url's from Modrinth and CurseForge...
automodpack.validation.title: Certificate Verification, matey
automodpack.validation.description1: Prevents man-in-the-middle attacks. One-time check, aye.
automodpack.validation.description2: Fingerprint be same for everyone. Ask yer server operator.
automodpack.validation.fingerprint.label: Server fingerprint (shortened):
automodpack.validation.confirm.text: Paste the full fingerprint to verify, savvy:
automodpack.validation.failed: Mismatch! Someone may be impersonatin' the server, arrr!
automodpack.validation.skip.title: Security Risk, beware!
automodpack.validation.skip.warning1: Without verification, attackers can inject malicious mods.
automodpack.validation.skip.warning2: Mods can access yer files and run arbitrary code.
automodpack.validation.skip.instruction: Skip only if ye know what ye be doin', matey.
automodpack.validation.skip.confirm.text: Type the above phrase to confirm:
